title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: a lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other open LLMs locally via a CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published to npm as “ollama”.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as “ollama”.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) exposing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to “Open WebUI”) with chat history, model management, and RAG plugins.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI tool for chatting, listing, and pulling models, installable via pip.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to a local Ollama instance via the JS client.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration package allowing Ollama models as generators in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes: LangChain, LlamaIndex, Docker, GPU, Raspberry Pi, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) published to Docker Hub as ollama/ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store, installable via pip.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models in Discord channels.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama, keeping the binary and model cache reproducible.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI that proxies to Ollama, installable with pip.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Proof-of-concept Zig client for Ollama demonstrating REST calls with the Zig standard library.
